text: Hans Fredrik Jensen (born 9 September 1997) is a Finnish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder and winger for Bundesliga club FC Augsburg and the Finland national team. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Jong Twente 2016–17 Tweede Divisie 4 1 0 0 — 4 1 Twente 2016–17 Eredivisie 25 4 1 0 — 26 4 2017–18 Eredivisie 30 5 4 0 — 34 5 Total 55 9 5 0 — 60 9 FC Augsburg 2018–19 Bundesliga 6 0 3 0 — 9 0 2019–20 Bundesliga 10 1 1 0 — 11 1 2020–21 Bundesliga 13 0 1 2 — 14 2 2021–22 Bundesliga 12 0 1 1 — 13 1 2022–23 Bundesliga 20 2 1 1 — 21 3 2023–24 Bundesliga 22 2 0 0 — 22 2 2024–25 Bundesliga 4 0 0 0 – – 4 0 Total 87 5 7 4 — 94 9 FC Augsburg II 2021–22 Regionalliga Bayern 3 1 — — 3 1 Career total 149 16 12 4 — 161 20 === International === National team Year Competitive Friendly Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Finland 2017 2Appearances in the 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification. 0 3 1 5 1 Finland 2018 1Appearance in the 2018–19 UEFA Nations League. 0 1 1 2 1 Finland 2019 4Appearances and goals in the UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying. 2 0 0 4 2 Finland 2020 4Appearances and goals in the 2020–21 UEFA Nations League. 3 1 0 5 3 Finland 2021 6Four appearances in the 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification, two appearances in UEFA Euro 2020. 0 3 0 9 0 Finland 2022 1Appearance in the 2022–23 UEFA Nations League. 0 0 0 1 0 Finland 2023 2Appearance in the UEFA Euro 2024. 0 0 0 2 0 Finland 2024 3Appearance in the UEFA Euro 2024 and 2024–25 UEFA Nations League B. 0 1 1 4 1 Total Total 23 5 9 3 32 8 Notes === International goals === :Scores and results list Finland's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Jensen goal.
